ingredients: 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened, 1 cup solid pack pumpkin puree, 1 large egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2   +   1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup halved fresh cranberries,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 1 tablespoon orange zest
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 2g 9%, Cholesterol 12mg 4%, Sodium 131mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 13g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 6g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 1mg 5%, Calcium 22mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 36mg 1%
